get tax_ids from list of names: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Taxonomy/TaxIdentifier/tax_identifier.cgi

get tree from NCBI: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Taxonomy/CommonTree/wwwcmt.cgi

calculate branch lengths: https://rdrr.io/cran/ape/man/compute.brlen.html

pairwise distances from a phylogenetic tree: https://rdrr.io/cran/ape/man/cophenetic.phylo.html

get species distance matrix from NCBI tax IDS: https://www.biostars.org/p/312148/
